name: 艾伦·C·坎普
name_full: 艾伦·C·坎普 Ellen C. Camp
introduction: Ellen Camp graduated in performing arts from the renown acting school Celia Helena in 2022. She went on to debut on her first movie that same year on "My Penguin Friend" starring Jean Reno & Adriana Barraza, directed by David Schurmann. In 2024, Ellen Camp joins the cast of the film "Por um Fio", alongside illustrious actors from Brazilian cinema.Ellen fell in love with the craft of acting in 2019 when she moved to São Paulo, Brazil to study performing arts. In 2020 she debuts on the stage on the play "Gota D'água" in the role of Alma and, in 2022 in "A Respectable Wedding" when she played Maria.
